attributes.action: Ronnie O'Sullivan to be BBC Sports Personality of the Year nominee.
attributes.additional_details:
Records;
1000 Century Breaks
Most Official Maximum Breaks 
Fastest Maximum Break
7 Masters Titles
7 UK Championship Titles 
Top Prize Money of All Time
attributes.background:
Snooker player Ronnie O'Sullivan turned pro in 1992, and since then has broken numerous records in the sport. Despite this he has never been nominated for BBC Sports Personality of the Year. 

Until Ronnie gets nominated for SPOTY, the TV licence should be free!!!
